item.title: Envoy WASM Filters in Rust
item.description: WASM I have had a renewed interest in WASM ever since I read the Mozilla WASI announcement and some of its supporting literature. A few things clicked for me after that, most prominently the potential for use beyond the browser. The compile once, run anywhere aspects echo the Linux container revolution of the last decade, but with true sandboxing, faster starts and without the baggage of a Linux userspace. The poster child of that revolution was of course Docker.
